dict.string: Today is 27 days, which are three weeks and six days, of the Omer.
Hoy es veintisiete días, que son tres semanas y seis días del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est vingt-sept jours, qui sont trois semaines et six jours du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ДВАДЦАТЬ СЕМЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ТРИ НЕДЕЛИ И ШЕСТЬ ДНЕЙ - ОМЕРА.
הַיּוֹם שִׁבְעָה וְעֶשְׂרִים יוֹם שֶׁהֵם שְׁלֹשָׁה שָׁבוּעוֹת וְשִׁשָּׁה יָמִים לָעֽוֹמֶר

Bonding is an essential quality of endurance. It expresses your unwavering commitment to the person or experience with which you are bonding, a commitment so powerful that you will endure all to preserve it.
Endurance without bonding will not endure.
Bad Mood Remedy: Commitment to a Cause

It can be challenging to extract yourself from the weight of a bad mood. One solution: commitment to a cause. Join Rabbi Jacobson for this short, inspiring video discussing the importance of commitment, and how it can help you to transcend your perceived personal limitations.
To ensure the endurance of your new resolution, bond with it immediately. This can be assured by promptly actualizing your resolution in some constructive deed or committing yourself to another.
